00113   void changeState(EState new_state) {
00114 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00115     assert ( new_state < kNStates );
00116 #endif
00117     _isState=new_state;
00118     _theStateFunc=_stateFunc[_isState];
00119   }

00265   Float_t getCalibratedValue(UInt_t module_index, UInt_t cell_index, Float_t pedestal_subtracted_adc_value) const {

00267     assert( _calibration );
